description:
Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files. 
	Aspose.Email makes it easy to work with HTML or plain text emails and their attachments. It allows developers to work against SMTP, POP, FTP and Microsoft Exchange servers. It supports mail merge and iCalendar features, customized header and body, retrieving content, header information and embedded files and much more.
releaseNotes:
New features:
NETWORKNET-33159 - Added support for MailMessage to EMLX conversion
NETWORKNET-33133 - Added support for listing X number of messages using ImapClient class
NETWORKNET-33129 - Added support to access Outlook tasks from PST
NETWORKNET-33124 - Added support to manipulate tasks on Exchange Server
NETWORKNET-21105 - Added support to disable the read and delete receipts sent by Exchange Server

Enhancements:
NETWORKNET-33158 - Enhanced ExchangeWebServiceClient to append the message as a sent item
NETWORKNET-33167 - Enhanced PersonalStorage to load a PST in read only mode

Bug Fixes:
NETWORKNET-33168 - Standalone backslash and backslash at the end of a line
NETWORKNET-33134 - Issues accessing the attachments of an embedded email

Exceptions:
NETWORKNET-33172 - KeyNotFoundException: FolderInfo.DeleteChildItem(MessageInfo.EntryId)
NETWORKNET-33170 - InvalidOperationException: PersonalStorage.ExtractMessage(MessageInfo)
NETWORKNET-33166 - InvalidOperationException: PersonalStorage.ExtractMessage - while parsing OST
NETWORKNET-33161 - ArgumentException: Offset and length were out of bounds for the array or count is greater...
NETWORKNET-33155 - NullReferenceException: While iterating over the folders of PST
NETWORKNET-33154 - NotSupportedException: PersonalStorage.ExtractMessage(messageInfo.EntryId)
NETWORKNET-33152 - InvalidOperationException: Aspose.Email.Outlook.Pst.FolderInfo.GetContents()
NETWORKNET-33147 - ArgumentOutOfRangeException : ExchangeWebServiceClient.ListMessages("Inbox")
NETWORKNET-33144 - Exception: Index was outside the bounds of the array
NETWORKNET-33141 - IndexOutOfRangeException when parsing a .MSG file
NETWORKNET-33140 - NotSupportedException: No data is available for encoding - Parse .MSG file
NETWORKNET-33139 - InvalidCastException: Specified cast is not valid - parsing .MSG files
NETWORKNET-33138 - FormatException: The specified content type is invalid. - parsing .MSG files
NETWORKNET-33137 - ArgumentException: The specified string is not in the form required for a subject. - parsing .MSG files
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within .NET applications
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
